trans-unit.source: The method call 'BinaryFormatter.{0}' is not safe when deserializing untrusted data.
trans-unit.target: The method call 'BinaryFormatter.{0}' is not safe when deserializing untrusted data.

trans-unit.source: Do not use insecure deserialization methods with BinaryFormatter
trans-unit.target: Do not use insecure deserialization methods with BinaryFormatter

trans-unit.source: The method BinaryFormatter.Deserialize is not safe when deserializing untrusted data, and not having its Binder property set to restruct deserialized types.
trans-unit.target: The method BinaryFormatter.Deserialize is not safe when deserializing untrusted data, and not having its Binder property set to restruct deserialized types.

trans-unit.source: Ensure BinaryFormatter.Binder is set before calling BinaryFormatter.Deserialize
trans-unit.target: Ensure BinaryFormatter.Binder is set before calling BinaryFormatter.Deserialize

trans-unit.source: The method BinaryFormatter.Deserialize is not safe when deserializing untrusted data, and not having its Binder property set to restruct deserialized types.
trans-unit.target: The method BinaryFormatter.Deserialize is not safe when deserializing untrusted data, and not having its Binder property set to restruct deserialized types.

trans-unit.source: Do not call BinaryFormatter.Deserialize without setting BinaryFormatter.Binder
trans-unit.target: Do not call BinaryFormatter.Deserialize without setting BinaryFormatter.Binder
